title: Mathematics Education Design for Pre-Service Teachers via Game-Based Mobile Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and foundational knowledge of secondary education curriculum
context.additional_context: Game-based learning conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Learners explore everyday mathematical concepts through creative digital expression activities

learning_goals: Learners can identify over ten mathematical concepts found in real-life environments through game-based mobile activities.
Learners can create over three creative content pieces expressing mathematical inquiry results using smartphone digital tools.
Learners can exchange math education design feedback with peer learners through online collaboration tools at least five times.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
